amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for State AIDS Drug Assistance Programs by $34.8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding appropriated in the bill for State AIDS Drug Assistance programs by $35 million and to make various equivalent reductions in funding for Agency for Health Care Policy and Research--Health Care Policy and Research, Administration for Children and Families--Refugee and Entrant Assistance, Office of the Secretary--General Departmental Management, and for the Office of the Secretary--Policy Research.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coburn amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 282 (Roll no. 377).
